ISSUE.TITLE: Properly show RECORD fields in BigQuery's schema
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: This RECORD: ![image](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/71468/20478473/ebeb428e-afe2-11e6-8dde-531415041eda.png) Will be shown in Redash just as `location_data`. Instead we should deconstruct it into `location_data.city_name`, `location_data.country_name`, etc.

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #2245 from kocsmy/design/query-round-3 Further Query Improvements

COMMIT.MESSAGE: BigQuery: properly handle RECORD fields (show nested fields). Closes #1413.
BigQuery: properly handle RECORD fields (show nested fields). Closes #1413.
